name: MIS CVMM Case Note Entries report
description:
The Custodial Violence Management Model (CVMM) report is available to CVMM pilot sites to enable data regarding referrals and caseloads to be captured and monitored by the establishment and work stream leads during the pilot phase, and to inform both the resources required to support a future rollout of CVMM nationally and the evaluation of the pilot in due course.
PDD0061 - v00.00.01 Last Updated 07/04/2016

dataset.name: CVM
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_TIME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE IN ('CVMC', 'CVMI', 'CVMM', 'CVMO', 'CVMR', 'CVMV') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Contact Date (Start):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Contact Date (End):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK >= 1 AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */))) UNION SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, '-', AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_TIME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CONTACT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_SUBTYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE.CODE IN ('CVMC', 'CVMI', 'CVMM', 'CVMO', 'CVMR', 'CVMV') AND AT_CASE_NOTE_CONTACT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Contact Date (Start):','D',,Mono,Free,Persistent,,User:2) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Contact Date (End):','D',,Mono,Free,Persistent,,User:3) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK < 1 AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, CODE, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CONTACT_TIME, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'CVMV') AS V_COUNT_VIOLENCE_REDUC, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'CVMM') AS V_COUNT_MONITORING, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'CVMR') AS V_COUNT_REFERRAL, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'CVMI') AS V_COUNT_INTERVENTION, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'CVMO') AS V_COUNT_ALERTS_OPEN, COUNT(CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE = 'CVMC') AS V_COUNT_ALERTS_CLOSED, SUM(V_COUNT_VIOLENCE_REDUC || V_COUNT_REFERRAL || V_COUNT_MONITORING || V_COUNT_INTERVENTION || V_COUNT_ALERTS_CLOSED || V_COUNT_ALERTS_OPEN) AS V_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_VIOLENCE_REDUC
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where([Case Note Sub Type Code]="CVMV")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_MONITORING
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where ([Case Note Sub Type Code]="CVMM")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_REFERRAL
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where ([Case Note Sub Type Code]="CVMR")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_INTERVENTION
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where([Case Note Sub Type Code]="CVMI")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_ALERTS_OPEN
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where([Case Note Sub Type Code]="CVMO")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_ALERTS_CLOSED
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Sub Type Code];All) Where([Case Note Sub Type Code]="CVMC")

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
